title: If Ryze gets his 4th rework...
body:
[](http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/1061/1924/products/Thinking_Face_Emoji_grande.png?v=1480481060)

Should we never expect another ryze rework since he's perfect?

http://i.imgur.com/3vvtpbN.png

upvoted everything to 5

i like watching the world burn

why would you want downvotes? Sounds more like a cover-up to me :3
savage.
Why did you feel the need to comment on something you clearly don't care about?

Cuz the only things riot replies at is at memes , and " riot i love you " threads
While ignoring every other issue because those issues doesnt really impact their LC$. Screw the rest of the 99.99999% of the ppl
Wondering why ppl still watch that garbage. Its the same shit always, same champs, same 15-20 min whack-a-mole laning  and the same map with teamfights that doesnt even last more than 1.5 seconds
But hey, Right clicking someone and crit them for their whole health insta killing them is so much skill isnt it. So comentators have to scream their throat off. OMGGGG SO PRO
RIP season 2/3

Downvote me all you want, i dont really give a flying shit
The game is in the shittiest state it has ever been  since this game's history, and all u care about is the number "4"
jesus fucking christ

So, Rioters aren't allowed to have fun or respond to meme posts because you feel like they should not be allowed to have fun, unless all your "problems" about League haven't been fixed first? You're full of shit, to be honest.

Riot isn't responding to balance threads, you say?
How about Meddler making weekly "Gameplay Thoughts" posts that he also uses to respond to specific balance questions, even for the things he doesn't mention? I don't know, it seems to me like you don't really care about the boards and don't frequent it as much as you'd need to in order to understand fully about what Riot does and doesn't answer and how active they really are.

You're just pulling it out of your ass, based on your irregular visits to the boards and you expect every post you see at that time of the day to be greeted by a Red. And that's also logistically impossible because how many of us can spam the boards with threads and how many Rioters can actually respond to us, during their free time of the day? No one's job at Riot is to sit at their computer and monitor the social sites and respond to every question we can think of.

>HURR DURR rito jokes on their boards, that's proof that the game went to shit

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/_Y5lAbv0ifM/maxresdefault.jpg

> So, Rioters aren't allowed to have fun or respond to meme posts because you feel like they should not be allowed to have fun, unless all your "problems" about League haven't been fixed first? You're full of shit, to be honest.

> Riot isn't responding to balance threads, you say?
> How about Meddler making weekly "Gameplay Thoughts" posts that he also uses to respond to specific balance questions, even for the things he doesn't mention? I don't know, it seems to me like you don't really care about the boards and don't frequent it as much as you'd need to in order to understand fully about what Riot does and doesn't answer and how active they really are.
> 
> You're just pulling it out of your ass, based on your irregular visits to the boards and you expect every post you see at that time of the day to be greeted by a Red. And that's also logistically impossible because how many of us can spam the boards with threads and how many Rioters can actually respond to us, during their free time of the day? No one's job at Riot is to sit at their computer and monitor the social sites and respond to every question we can think of.
> 
> https://i.ytimg.com/vi/_Y5lAbv0ifM/maxresdefault.jpg

Just to keep it short, i visit the boards regurarly just to see whats going on. 
Despite how active you're making them to be, the game in in its shittiest state it has ever been.
And to sum it up : 
""" So, Rioters aren't allowed to have fun or respond to meme posts because you feel like they should not be allowed to have fun, unless all your "problems" abou_t League haven't been fixed first_? You're full of shit, to be honest."""

**_League haven't been fixed first_**

I never said they shouldnt have fun, rofl.
The bold text i've did to you clearly has more priority than shitty posting. They just give the impression that they dont care one bit bout their game.
Its ok tho, as soon as I get my I7 CPU i'll fuck off to heroes of the storm. Where things are fresh, lots of content , and is more balanced than this one shot bullshit, champ favoritism, 1 main map game.  While also it sucks because im used to LoL but the game is worse than the most radioactive toxic waste right now
If this is riot's way to destroy their game, so be it. Its their game after all , but its pretty incredible how they want to fuck it up even more.
You're just another guy that defends  , which I assume u dont know crap about this game's history, where it was actually fun.  I play since beta and trust me, Riot was more focused on the actual game and the 99,9999% of the players, not in their LC$ cancerou$ play$ and dumb memes&games that arent even funny, at all.
I understand that spamming {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}}  or 444444, upvote to 4, downvote to 4 , is WAY MORE IMPORTANT  than seeing the incredible, atrocious game balance
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MbRiYV5SBAI   Yeah, riot said they removed the laser towers because u coudlnt last hit under turret. That was the dumbest thing said ever, a gaming company has said in all the history of the games. And this is just one big flaw of the game alongside thousands , despite thousands of threads about " make the turrets better" , instead, riot replies just a thread below this one , which is obviously memes&games, containing a shit joke made from a 12 year old.  Its so disheartening with all my honesty .
Anyways
Peace
Ps. I actually kept it long, sorry for that

Not every rioter works in the balance or gameplay department. God forbid they spend 12 seconds posting something in memes and games over something they really can't answer themselves, and its not like they commonly do that either aside from maybe the occasional forum mod.

> Cuz the only things riot replies at is at memes , and " riot i love you " threads

that's just straight up untrue. Even ignoring the "help and support" forum Reds are fairly active in "Story, Art, and Sound" and even Morello + others have been more active in Gameplay recently

but you've brought a shit ton of negativity that isn't even related to the post. You want to complain, go complain someplace where it's relevant at least
we need to downvote this to 4 likes!
tfw it gets downvoted further

This thread is full of win

His ultimate definitely does not suck. But it leads to another problem: 
Since he doesn't have a "real"  ultimate all his dmg needs to be shoved into his basic abilities which then end up too stronk/opressive whatever. 
I just hope riot gives him some love back. It's sad having such a fantastic champ gutted because of pro play and high elo.
